parameters: Sometimes you might encounter a \C[1]random battle\c.
These battles will reward you with \C[1]experience\c and
You can choose to \C[1]run away\c from these battles
But if you want to stand your own in battle, you might
want to train by fighting in these random battles.
You can navigate through the battle menu by using
You have a regular \C[1]Attack\c that does a small
ammount of damage but doesn't consume any MP.
And then you have \C[1]Skills\c which are more
powerful attacks but consume some MP.
You can use \i[176] Magic Water to restore MP. See
